metadata.title: Consul Dedicated Automation
metadata.description: Deploy managed Consul in AWS and Azure. Connect client virtual machines (AWS EC2 and Azure VM), Kubernetes (EKS and AKS) clients, and Elastic Container Service (ECS) clients using Terraform modules.

collection.name: HCP Consul Dedicated Deployment Automation
collection.description: Deploy managed Consul in AWS and Azure. Connect client virtual machines (AWS EC2 and Azure VM), Kubernetes (EKS and AKS) clients, and Elastic Container Service (ECS) clients using Terraform modules.

tutorials.name: Get started with end-to-end deployment configuration
tutorials.description: Automate the deployment of a HCP Consul Dedicated datacenter on AWS or Azure with different kinds of workload. Get an overview of the available Terraform resources on the HCP Consul Dedicated platform.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Deploy HCP Consul Dedicated with EKS using Terraform
tutorials.description: Automate the deployment of a HCP Consul Dedicated datacenter and deploy a demo application  on AWS EKS using Consul Helm Chart.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.description: Automate the deploy of a HCP Consul Dedicated datacenter and deploy a demo application  on AWS EC2 using Nomad.

tutorials.name: Deploy HCP Consul Dedicated with VM using Terraform
tutorials.description: Deploy an end-to-end development environment, complete with an HVN, a HCP Consul server cluster, a Consul client and demo application running on an Azure virtual machine (VM).

tutorials.description: Automate the deployment of an HCP Consul Dedicated datacenter AWS and connect it to an  existing EKS runtime. Use the EKS runtime to deploy your workload.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
